QuestData.Title: Whitepetal Lake
QuestData.Description: Reports suggest that things are quiet at Whitepetal Lake today, but I've dispatched Ren Firetongue and He Softfoot to make sure it stays they way.$B$BIf you want to aid the effort further, head to the west to the lake, meet up with He, and help him keep things secure from any hostile threats.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to He Softfoot at Whitepetal Lake.
